jobDescription: For more than 40 years, East West Bank has served as a pathway to success. With over 130 locations across the U.S. and Greater China, we are the premier financial bridge between the East and West. Our teams of experienced, multi-cultural professionals help guide businesses and community members on both sides of the Pacific looking to explore new markets and create new opportunities. And our sustained growth and expertise in industries like real estate, entertainment and media, private equity and venture capital, high-tech and aviation help build sustainable businesses and expand our employees’ potential for career advancement.  Headquartered in California, East West Bank (Nasdaq: EWBC) is a top performing commercial bank with an exclusive focus on the U.S. and Greater China markets. With assets of $37.7 billion, we’re ranked among the 30 largest banks in the United States and currently top 5 in “America’s 100 Best Banks” by Forbes, a list where we've consistently been in the top 15 since 2010. With a strong foundation, an enterprising spirit and a commitment to absolute integrity, East West Bank gives people the confidence to reach further.  We are currently seeking a Data Analyst with banking or treasury management experience. The Data Analyst will define and execute on analytics and reporting to support EWB's Global Transaction Services (GTS) business unit. This position requires excellent analytical and communication skills and an entrepreneurial spirit to improve processes. The individual will work closely with product managers, sales, relationship managers, finance, marketing, bank partners, vendors, and the leadership team to understand the information need, define data requirements, design feasible reporting solutions, and provide ongoing support to business partners.
